titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Dennis Sinclair papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

physdesc.physfacet: positive and negative, and 4 items (70 p.), and 5 sound cassettes.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Partially edited transcripts; tapes located in sound tape collection.

archdesc.bioghist: National coordinator of the National Peace and Freedom Party.
archdesc.scopecontent: Articles, newsletters, newspaper clippings, lists of supporters, and state correspondence files concerning the election campaign of Eldridge Cleaver in 1968; and transcripts, 1972, of interviews with Sinclair, conducted by Peggy Kusnerz, concerning his participation with the Peace and Freedom Party; also photographs.

physdesc.physfacet: positive and negative, and 4 items (70 p.), and 5 sound cassettes.

c01.scopecontent: Articles, newsletters, newspaper clippings, lists of supporters, and state correspondence files concerning the election campaign of Eldridge Cleaver in 1968; and transcripts, 1972, of interviews with Sinclair, conducted by Peggy Kusnerz, concerning his participation with the Peace and Freedom Party; also photographs.
Oral interview conducted by Peggy Ann Kusnerz relating to his participation in the 1968 election campaign.
